exceptions.exn: In environment A : Set A0, A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA, multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) l1, l2 : list (Term A n) a : Term A n H : canonical A0 eqA ltM (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a l1) H0 : canonical A0 eqA ltM (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a l2) Unable to unify "plusP ?M2182 ?M2183 ?M2184 ?M2185 ?M2187 ?M2188 ?M2190 ?M2191 (pluspf ?M2183 ?M2185 ?M2186 ?M2189 ?M2190 ?M2191)" with "olist (A:=A) ltM (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a (pluspf A0 (eqA:=eqA) plusA eqA_dec (ltM:=ltM) ltM_dec l1 l2)) /\\ nZterm A0 eqA (n:=n) (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a (pluspf A0 (eqA:=eqA) plusA eqA_dec (ltM:=ltM) ltM_dec l1 l2))".
